title: ONE-DAY SALE: $23+ O/W Fall Flights
text:
Home > Flight Deals > ONE-DAY SALE: $23+ O/W Fall Flights ONE-DAY SALE: $23+ O/W Fall Flights July 8, 2015 9:00am by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
What's a measly 23 bucks and 10 cents get you these days? A one-way flight with ultra-low-cost carrier Spirit, that's what! For today only, Spirit honors Shark Week with an airfare sale that discounts travel during select dates in August, September, October, and November. Again, this sale is only valid today, July 8; specifically until 11:59 p.m. ET. 
Of the 370 featured routes, 60-plus routes start at $23.10 each way (rounded up to $24 one-way; round-trip, as is displayed below, is $48);— ... more 
What's a measly 23 bucks and 10 cents get you these days? A one-way flight with ultra-low-cost carrier Spirit, that's what! For today only, Spirit honors Shark Week with an airfare sale that discounts travel during select dates in August, September, October, and November. Again, this sale is only valid today, July 8; specifically until 11:59 p.m. ET. 
Of the 370 featured routes, 60-plus routes start at $23.10 each way (rounded up to $24 one-way; round-trip, as is displayed below, is $48);—though those rates are exclusively for members of the ultra-low-cost carrier's $9 Fare Club . Non-member one-way rates start at $34.10. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of this sale by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros:
